  3. E.RUDA

E.DA

Daru

Introduction

E.RUDA was a South Korean duo under A Flat Entertainment. Consisting of former members of Bloomy, they debuted on April 29, 2019 with the digital single "A Seasonal Story : Spring". They presumably disbanded sometime in late 2019 due to inactivity and the removal of their webpage.
